description: Primes p such that p^2 reversed is also prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: Select[ Range[ 2500 ], PrimeQ[ # ] && PrimeQ[ ToExpression[ StringReverse[ ToString[ #^2 ] ] ] ] & ]
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(2000) | IsPrime(Seqint(Reverse(Intseq(p^2))))]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 12 2013
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 06 2001
